docs.snippet: A mentally ill North Carolina man accused of trying to join al-Qaida-linked fighters in Syria can be forcibly medicated to see if that will make him competent for trial, a federal appeals court ruled Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A mentally ill North Carolina man accused of trying to join al-Qaida-linked fighters in Syria can be forcibly medicated to see if that will make him competent for trial, a federal appeals court ruled Wednesday.

headline.main: US Court Says Man Can Be Forcibly Medicated in Terror Case
headline.print_headline: US Court Says Man Can Be Forcibly Medicated in Terror Case

docs.snippet: Software and apps are helping millions of Americans trying to solve civil problems on their own....
docs.lead_paragraph: Software and apps are helping millions of Americans trying to solve civil problems on their own.

headline.main: Legal Aid With a Digital Twist

docs.snippet: The United States attorney’s office in Los Angeles filed a civil asset forfeiture lawsuit for policies taken out by Syed Rizwan Farook, worth $275,000 in total....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States attorney’s office in Los Angeles filed a civil asset forfeiture lawsuit for policies taken out by Syed Rizwan Farook, worth $275,000 in total.
docs.abstract: United States attorney’s office in Los Angeles files suit to seize payments on life insurance policies of Syed Rizwan Farook, who killed 14 in San Bernadino, Calif, with his wife Tashfeen Malik in 2015 terrorist attack.

headline.main: Government Sues for San Bernardino Gunman’s Life Insurance Policies
headline.print_headline: Government Sues for San Bernardino Gunman’s Life Insurance
